com.bmc.arsys.api

Class FieldType

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bmc.arsys.api.FieldType

  • public final class FieldType
extends Object
    The FieldType class returns a list of fields for a particular form on the specified server. You can retrieve all fields or limit the list to fields of a particular type or fields modified after a specified time.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Returns all data fields.
